                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I have actually heard the whole album. Rest assured, Katie fans, it&#039;s good. 
You&#039;ll like it. But more importantly, real music fans should really appreciate 
this album. It&#039;s got much more to it than stock pop appeal. To my ears it&#039;s got
real musical longevity. The kind of album that will be returned to in several 
years time. There&#039;s stillmoreÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â  too much Mike Batt input, but on the whole Katie 
and band are doing some very different things on this record. Things you&#039;ve not 
heard from her before, but without losing the elements which make it a Katie Melua 
album. This is easily her finest work to date, even if some of the subject matter 
is ropey, and Batt is still a useless lyricist.

PICTURES
OCT 01, 2007
